sentences.sentence: Hostile relationships invidiously contaminate our wellbeing.
sentences.translation: 敌对关系损害我们的健康。

sentences.sentence: We never fully adapt to hostile relationships, they invidiously contaminate our wellbeing, squatting inside our minds as unresolved, destructive ruminations.
sentences.translation: 我们不可能适应这种敌对关系，这种不良的人际关系会损害身心健康，长久留存在我们心里，会让人陷入无以解决的恶性心理困境。
